name: Global Solarized Light
description: A fork of Solarized Dark Everywhere and Global Dark Style. I basically took the latter and applied the colors in the same way as the first. Recommendation: use it with Global Solarized Dark and Zenfox.
additional_info:
2.0.0 (July 21st 2019): completely changed everything to be a fork of Global Dark Style. Using Solarized Dark Everywhere as a main base was making lots of sites break and images disappear.
2.1.0 (July 21st 2019): adapted remaining code, apparently functional. Changed license to match Global Dark Style.
2.2.0 (July 25th 2019): google and facebook improvements
2.3.0 (August 14th 2019): remove ::before and ::after styling, no longer excludes background images from div. This should make sites less broken and make buttons no longer invisible.


===Old Changelongs===
Version 1.0.0: partially broken for some sites, but good enough overall.
Version 1.1.0: removed most google domains since they were broken. Still works for google search.
Version 1.2.0: Fixed transparent popups. Changed name from "Solarized Light All Pages" to "Global Solarized Light". Removed more google domains, facebook, tripadvisor, instagram, tumblr, picrew. Cleaner regex.
Version 1.3.0: cleaner regex, now also accounts for links with "prefix" such as (prefix.sitename.com). Removed steam, epicgames, stackexchange, askubuntu, superuser, github, gitlab, whatsapp, feedly.
